amendment.description: Amendment ensures that proper cybersecurity education efforts focus on those that would benefit most, namely novice computer users, young and elderly populations, low-income populations, and populations in areas of planned broadband expansion or deployment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 111-410 to emphasize that cybersecurity awareness and education efforts focus on novice computer users, young and elderly populations, low-income populations, and populations in areas of planned broadband expansion or deployment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCarthy (NY) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
